General.Name: Krasnoyarskenergosbyt PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Krasnoyarskenergosbyt sells electricity in Russia. It also provides management services for apartment buildings. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Krasnoyarsk, Russia.
